Event.name: Audit Add Login to Server Role Event

CustomTask.cmd: regedit /s /a "%output_path%%COMPUTERNAME%_SQL_Best_Practices_IMAGE_FILE_EXEC_OP.REG" "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Image File Execution Options" > NUL 2>&1

regedit /s /a "%output_path%%COMPUTERNAME%_SQL_Best_Practices_IMAGE_FILE_EXEC_OP_WOW64.REG" "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Image File Execution Options" > NUL 2>&1

regedit /s /a "%output_path%%COMPUTERNAME%_SQL_Best_Practices_McAfeeBufferOverrunEntercept.REG" "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Network Associates\TVD\Shared Components\On Access Scanner\BehaviourBlocking" > NUL 2>&1

CustomTask.taskname: Top CPU Query Show Plan XML
Top CPU Query Show Plan XML

CustomTask.cmd: if exists (select * from sys.dm_xe_sessions where name = 'PssdiagXeventCapture') ALTER EVENT SESSION [PssdiagXeventCapture] ON SERVER STATE=stop if exists ( select * from sys.server_event_sessions where name ='PssdiagXeventCapture') DROP EVENT SESSION [PssdiagXeventCapture] ON SERVER
